text: Benjamin Silva is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Goa Legislative Assembly from Velim in the 2012 Goa Legislative Assembly election as an Independent member.My NetaMany factors impact political fortunes in SalceteIn Salcete, once again it is advantage Congress for Lok Sabha6 ruling Christian MLAs together in Kerala, Dy CM bursts out at CM: Coincidence? ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Members of the Goa Legislative Assembly Category:People from South Goa district Category:Goa MLAs 2012–2017 Category:Independent politicians in India
